kit.leader_skill: "Universe 11" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Sonata of Purification
super_attack.effect: Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK; Seals Super Attack

passive_skill.name: Marcarita's Counsel
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 110% up; (Forever) Medium chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) "Universe 11" Category allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 40% up; (Forever) "Realm of Gods", "Siblings' Bond" or "Bond of Master and Disciple" Category allies' ATK & DEF 20% up; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 11% up (up to 44%); When there is another "Universe 11" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres

lines.text: ATK & DEF 110% up
Medium chance of evading enemy's attack
"Universe 11" Category allies' Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 40% up
"Realm of Gods", "Siblings' Bond" or "Bond of Master and Disciple" Category allies' ATK & DEF 20% up
ATK & DEF 11% up (up to 44%)
Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to Rainbow Ki Spheres
lines.context: When there is another "Universe 11" Category ally attacking in the same turn
